help_section.questions_about_discount: Do you have questions about document discounting?
help_section.interest_rate_answer: Banks will offer their interest rates, which can be nominal or effective. After that, it is converted to a discount rate, which is used to calculate the present value of a future cash flow.
help_section.portfolio_answer: A document portfolio is a set of invoices, bills of exchange, or any other document used to obtain financing through discounting. You manage this portfolio within the Desco application.
help_section.why_discount_answer: Discounting your documents allows you to obtain immediate liquidity without having to wait for their maturity. Additionally, it allows you to take advantage of investment opportunities or cover cash needs more efficiently.
help_section.how_discount_answer: The discount is applied at the agreed interest rate, taking into account the remaining time until the document's maturity. The shorter the term, the greater the discount applied.
help_section.tutorials_answer: Here you will find detailed tutorials on how to use the Desco application to manage your documents and make the most of its features.
